cause.description:
LEGALIZE MARIJUANA!! SELF EXPLAINITORY!!! THE BATTLE CONTINUES ON FACEBOOK! CONTACT A LOCAL STONER NEAR YOU.. THEY ARE YOUR NEIGHBORS!!!
1. PEACE AND HAPPINESS
2. WILL STOP WARS
3. WILL PUT ADVIL OUT OF BUSINESS!
4. GOD WILL IT
5. FEED STARVING CHILDREN
6. GIVE HOBOS A PLACE TO SLEEP
7. MAKE EARL HAPPY
8. WHAT WRONG HAS MARY JANE EVER DONE TO YOU
9. MORE PEOPLE SMOKE MARIJUANA IN THE UNITED STATES THAN VOTED FOR GEORGE W BUSH
cause.name: LEGALIZE MARIJUANA!!!
